channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- SDK, Java Technology Edition
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- SDK, Java Technology Edition

item.title: CVE-2018-1656|2024-08-05T04:07:44.103Z -- ibm -- sdk%2C%20java%20technology%20edition
item.description: The IBM Java Runtime Environment's Diagnostic Tooling Framework for Java (DTFJ) (IBM SDK, Java Technology Edition 6.0 , 7.0, and 8.0) does not protect against path traversal attacks when extracting compressed dump files. IBM X-Force ID: 144882.

item.title: CVE-2018-1417|2024-08-05T03:59:39.053Z -- ibm -- sdk%2C%20java%20technology%20edition
item.description: Under certain circumstances, a flaw in the J9 JVM (IBM SDK, Java Technology Edition 7.1 and 8.0) allows untrusted code running under a security manager to elevate its privileges. IBM X-Force ID: 138823.

item.title: CVE-2018-1517|2024-08-05T04:07:42.937Z -- ibm -- sdk%2C%20java%20technology%20edition
item.description: A flaw in the java.math component in IBM SDK, Java Technology Edition 6.0, 7.0, and 8.0 may allow an attacker to inflict a denial-of-service attack with specially crafted String data. IBM X-Force ID: 141681.

item.title: CVE-2023-38264|2024-06-04T17:28:18.641Z -- ibm -- sdk%2C%20java%20technology%20edition
item.description: The IBM SDK, Java Technology Edition's Object Request Broker (ORB) 7.1.0.0 through 7.1.5.21 and 8.0.0.0 through 8.0.8.21 is vulnerable to a denial of service attack in some circumstances due to improper enforcement of the JEP 290 MaxRef and MaxDepth deserialization filters. IBM X-Force ID: 260578.

item.title: CVE-2023-38264|2024-08-02T17:39:12.051Z -- ibm -- sdk%2C%20java%20technology%20edition
item.description: The IBM SDK, Java Technology Edition's Object Request Broker (ORB) 7.1.0.0 through 7.1.5.21 and 8.0.0.0 through 8.0.8.21 is vulnerable to a denial of service attack in some circumstances due to improper enforcement of the JEP 290 MaxRef and MaxDepth deserialization filters. IBM X-Force ID: 260578.
